title: FS: Very Tough 1907 Raymond Kahn Cleveland Indians PC - No Writing!
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: Very Tough 1907 Raymond Kahn Cleveland Indians PC - No Writing!
posts.post_content:
A beautiful example - the best that I have ever seen. At least in VG condition with no writing or postal cancellation on the back. This is an extremely tough item to find. Just two examples have been graded, and the highest is VG.

Nice images of Nap Lajoie and Addie Joss.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/kahn%20indians_zpsjbbahl7r.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/kahn%20indians%20back_zpswvkfks5t.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $725 delivered.

Tom C
